plugin_info.plugin_description: Run the Model using the active network as input.
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: Written by Stephen Knox stephen.knox@mancheser.ac.uk (c) Copyright 2015, University of Manechster. For more information visit www.hydraplatform.com

arg.name: Network
arg.help: Specify the network against which you will run this model.

arg.name: Scenario
arg.help: Specify the scenario against which you will run this model.

arg.name: server_url
arg.help: Specify the URL of the server to which this plug-in connects.

arg.name: session_id
arg.help: Specify the session ID for the connection. If not specified, the plugin will try to connect based on the credentials it finds in config
